reviews.review: Mad as game

best game ever

Portal 2 is a physics-based puzzle game. Good games of this genre should have a smooth difficulty curve, as well as varied and interesting puzzles. Having pleasant visuals and a nice atmosphere also helps, because if you are going to spend some time in one place figuring out a solution, it might as well look good. Portal 2 has all of those qualities - in abundance!

Puzzle games don't Need to have amazing storylines. Or stellar voice acting. Or a world you want to see more of. Or well-developed, complex characters. But Portal 2 has All of these as well! And for this - for going above and beyond what is required in its genre - I rate it as a masterpiece, and one of the best games I've ever played.

Finished game a while ago, had a fantastic time. Much better than the 2'nd, a tons funnier, more challenges, was more challenging as well! I got stuck on a part for a while, never happened to me in the first. Graphics much better, and so far the co-op is also challenging and the dialogue then is also hilarious. I would STRONGLY encourage you to play the game to the end, and maybe get a friend or a rando online to do co-op with you. Fun experience, would definitely wipe my memories to play again. Did I forget to mention this is a gold mine of great dialogue and story? DAMN IT, of course I forgot the best part. Seriously though, gold mine I tell ya

Do you like thinking in 4D? Do you like Retro-futurism based humor and technology? Did you like Portal 1? Do you enjoy not being able to change FOV? Then this game is for you! I'm not Cave Johnson, but if I were I'd love this game; not enough lemons to make lemonade OR burn down houses.
